General.Name: Neuroscientific Biopharmaceuticals Ltd
General.Description: NeuroScientific Biopharmaceuticals Limited develops therapeutic treatments for neurodegenerative diseases through preclinical and clinical studies of patented technologies. Its lead drug candidates include EmtinB for treatment of neurodegenerative dementia and Alzheimer's disease, and degenerative conditions of the optic nerve. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Cottesloe, Australia.
